title: San Antonio Missions National Historical Park: Church Information
body: Church Information       The National Park Service provides this information as a courtesy to park visitors. We try to be as accurate as possible. For the most up-to-date information, please contact the parish church for which you need information.          1 Mission Concepción 807 Mission Road Contact: Church contact at 210/533-8955. Church service: Sunday at 10:00 a.m. (English) 1               12:00 noon (Mariachi - Bilingual)  Mission San José 6701 San Jose Drive Contact: Office at 210/922-0543 sanjoseinsatx@yahoo.com Saturday at 5:30 p.m.(English), Sunday at 7:30 a.m. (Español)  1              9:00 a.m. (English), 1 10:30 a.m. (English), and 1 12:00 p.m. (Mariachi - Bilingual) Mission San Juan 9101 Graf Road Contact: Office at 210/534-3161. Church Services: Saturday at 5:00 p.m. (English), Sunday at 11:00 a.m. (English) 1 12:30 p.m. (Español) 1 7:15 p.m. (Español)  Mission Espada 10040 Espada Road Contact: Office at 210/627-2064 EspadaCabrini@aol.com Church Services: Saturday at 6:00 p.m. (English), Sunday at 10:00 a.m. (Español)         Archdiocese of San Antonio Chancery Office: 210/734-2620 mailbox@archsa.org Old Spanish Missions (Las Misiones) OldSpanishMissions@archsa.org
